ReferenceDocuments.name: Indicate if the PK sample was
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate if the PK sample was not done.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PCSTAT
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM-based dataset, the SDTMIG variable PCSTAT is populated by mapping the value of the CDASH variable PCSTAT "NOT DONE" to "NOT DONE".

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: A Not Done check box, which indicates the test was "NOT DONE". Typically, there would be one check box for each measurement. This field can be useful on individual sample collections to confirm that a blank result field is meant to be blank.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate if the specimen was not done.
